shorts.title: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to Board of Directors
shorts.title_distilled: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.
shorts.content: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.

shorts.title: Colbert and Grebas PC donates to school
shorts.title_distilled: Colbert and Grebas PC donates to school.
shorts.description: Each month the law firm of Colbert & Grebas PC has a “Dressing Down for a Cause Day.” A check representing donations from staff in its Moosic and Kingston offices, in addition to a matching donation from the firm, is given to a local recipient. A recent donation was presented to the Scranton School for Deaf & Hard-of-Hearing Children. The firm supports the school’s commitment to focus on challenges that are ahead for the children who attend the school and the importance of providing an outstanding education for the students. From left: presenting the donation on behalf of the firm […]
shorts.content: Each month the law firm of Colbert & Grebas PC has a “Dressing Down for a Cause Day.” A check representing donations from staff in its Moosic and Kingston offices, in addition to a matching donation from the firm, is given to a local recipient. A recent donation was presented to the Scranton School for Deaf & Hard-of-Hearing Children. The firm supports the school’s commitment to focus on challenges that are ahead for the children who attend the school and the importance of providing an outstanding education for the students. shorts.title: Rotary helps NEPA Community Health Care
shorts.title_distilled: Rotary helps NEPA Community Health Care.
shorts.description: The New Milford Area Rotary recently celebrated a successful completion of a $4,500 District Designated Fund grant provided to Northeast Pennsylvania Community Health Care. The $4,500 grant included funds from New Milford Area Rotary, the Peoples Security Bank and Trust Community Foundation and the Honesdale National Bank. Three refrigerator/freezer vaccine storage units that include emergency power backup features were purchased and installed at three of the NEPA Community Health Care locations, including Hallstead, Montrose and Greenfield Twp. These vaccine storage units have each already proven their value in maintaining the vaccine supply at each site, during lengthy weather-induced power outages. […]
shorts.content: The New Milford Area Rotary recently celebrated a successful completion of a $4,500 District Designated Fund grant provided to Northeast Pennsylvania Community Health Care. The $4,500 grant included funds from New Milford Area Rotary, the Peoples Security Bank and Trust Community Foundation and the Honesdale National Bank. Three refrigerator/freezer vaccine storage units that include emergency power backup features were purchased and installed at three of the NEPA Community Health Care locations, including Hallstead, Montrose and Greenfield Twp. These vaccine storage units have each already proven their value in maintaining the vaccine supply at each site, during lengthy weather-induced power outages. […]
shorts.content_distilled: New Milford Area Rotary recently celebrated a successful completion of a $4,500 District Designated Fund grant provided to Northeast Pennsylvania Community Health Care.

shorts.title: Extreme cold to persist through workweek in NEPA

shorts.description: (WBRE/WYOU) — After the recent winter storm hit Northeastern Pennsylvania, cold temperatures are expected to continue to grip the Keystone State for several days. shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Communities throughout NEPA continue to dig out their streets, sidewalks, and parking spaces after last weekend's winter storm, and two days later, most major roads are clear, but how well did local Department of Public Works (DPW) workers do with cleaning up? It depends on who you ask. 28/22 News [...]
